## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm really interested in the Verus ecosystem, and I've heard about Verus PBaaS. What is Verus PBaaS (Public Blockchains as a Service), and what benefits does it offer?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus PBaaS is a decentralized platform that offers a range of benefits, including the ability to create new blockchains, currencies, and liquidity pools without any programming. It also enables easy transfer of currencies across blockchains and conversion of currencies without an exchange. This platform provides a high degree of flexibility and customization, allowing users to create tailored solutions for their specific needs. Would you like to know more about how it works or its potential applications?

**User:**
That sounds really interesting. How can I access the Verus testnet and start exploring its features?

**AI Assistant:**
You can access the Verus testnet through the released versions of Verus Desktop and Verus CLI wallets. This will allow you to try out the features of the testnet, including creating new identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains, as well as sending and converting currencies. Are you new to blockchain technology or do you have experience with wallets and testnets?

**User:**
I have some experience with testnets, but I'm curious about the current status of the Verus testnet. What is the community working on?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus testnet is a fully functional, intrinsically decentralized multi-chain blockchain platform that is currently available for use. The community is actively working on hardening and preparing the testnet protocols for mainnet release. It's an exciting time for Verus, and the community is dedicated to making it a robust and reliable platform. Would you like to get involved in the community or learn more about the development process?
What is Verus PBaaS (Public Blockchains as a Service), and what benefits does it offer?

Verus PBaaS (Public Blockchains as a Service) is a decentralized platform that offers a range of benefits, including the ability to create new blockchains, currencies, and liquidity pools without any programming. This platform provides a high degree of flexibility and customization, allowing users to create tailored solutions for their specific needs.

Title: Verus Announces New Multicurrency, Multichain DeFi Protocols and Immediate Public Availability of…
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/verus-announces-new-multicurrency-multichain-defi-protocols-and-immediate-public-availability-of-f1868f259ce5
Content:Verus Announces New Multicurrency, Multichain DeFi Protocols and Immediate Public Availability of Fully Functional, Multichain Testnet
Without any programming, you can now create new identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains for your business, your government, your projects, a worthy cause, your family, or your next decentralized application suite. Send currencies worldwide on the same chain, or across blockchains with ease. Even convert currencies to others on the network without an exchange by sending to yourself and converting along the way.A New Era of Crypto
All of these features are currently available on Verus testnet (VerusID is already on mainnet), and the community is in high gear, hardening and preparing the testnet protocols for mainnet release. The new Verus testnet is a full-featured, intrinsically decentralized multi-chain blockchain platform with an unlimited number of identities, currencies, liquidity pools, and blockchains. It is accessible from the released versions of Verus Desktop and Verus CLI wallets, and it is the beginning of a new age in crypto. There are so many things you can do with Verus that you cannot with any other cryptocurrency platform, and you can try them all today.
Capabilities which to our knowledge are not available on any other decentralized platform today
As Verus PBaaS (Public Blockchains as a Service) offers completely new capabilities that go beyond today’s decentralized platforms in many fundamental ways, the worldwide Verus community put its energy into creation, rather than convincing everyone that its capabilities are possible. Members across
